Summary: FLASH/ORB BRIGHTENS THEN DIMS THEN GROWS WITH A FLASH THEN SHRINKS /KEEPS BRIGHTNESS,ANGLES OFF AND GONE.
divs: Sighting Detailsok i'm going to sound crazy but i swear on my life and everything i know as truth, i just saw something in the sky over arizona, i saw a flash then i noticed it, a small orb looking glowing object,it got brighter and then dimmer and then flash it got big as a close star then it shrunk but kept its brightness then it it dimmed and hit a 90 degree angle and was gone. ok i know how i may sound but there is no way it was a plane cause plains go by my house all the time and the altitude at wich this was flying ,no theres no f-n way it was a plane, i watch the stars almost every night and i never in all my life seen anything that distinct, wow i cant stop thinking about it. im not saying ufo but i saw something, ok i need a drink and i dont drink at all,crazy wow, sorry i just had to tell someone.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Peoria
There were no other sightings in Peoria on or around March 21st 2012
